results.molarMass: The molar mass of "{formula}" is: {mass} g/mol

common.chooseTool: Choose a tool in the sidebar to get started.
common.description: This application is designed to help students and teachers with chemical calculations data visualization, and content organization.

banner.title: Cookie Consent
banner.message: This site uses cookies to improve your experience. You can accept or decline non-essential cookies.

preferences.title: Cookie Preferences
preferences.analyticsDescription: Help us understand how you use the site (Google Analytics, Microsoft Clarity)

metadata.description: Comprehensive information on how we collect, use, and protect your data, cookies, and third-party services in compliance with international privacy regulations.

content.intro: This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your information when accessing our website and educational chemistry services.
introItems: Your rights and how to exercise them

introduction.paragraph1: Mol Class is committed to protecting your privacy and personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our website and educational chemistry services.
introduction.paragraph2: This policy complies with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA), and other applicable data protection regulations. We are transparent about our data practices and respect your privacy rights.

technicalData.title: Technical Data
technicalData.legalBasis: Legal basis: Legitimate interest for service operation and security
technicalData.purpose: Purpose: Ensure proper functioning and security of our educational platform

educationalData.title: Educational Data
typesList: Interactions with chemistry calculators and tools
Calculation history (stored locally in your browser)
Feature usage patterns and performance metrics
educationalData.legalBasis: Legal basis: Consent and legitimate interest for service improvement
educationalData.purpose: Purpose: Personalize learning experience and improve educational tools

cookies.title: Cookies and Similar Technologies
cookies.essentialBasis: Legal basis: Necessary for service operation (no consent required)
analyticsList: Google Analytics: Traffic analysis and user behavior tracking
Microsoft Clarity: User experience analysis and session recordings
cookies.analyticsBasis: Legal basis: Consent (can be withdrawn at any time)
cookies.purpose: Purpose: Improve user experience and platform performance
cookies.consent: Consent: You can manage cookie preferences through our consent banner

registrationData.title: Registration Data
registrationData.legalBasis: Legal basis: Consent and contract performance
registrationData.purpose: Purpose: Provide personalized services and account management

generalPolicy.title: General Policy
items: We do not knowingly collect personal data from children under 13
If we discover collection of such data, we will delete it immediately
Parents/guardians should supervise their children's online activities

dataUsage.intro: We use your data for the following purposes:
dataUsage.explanation: Data is used exclusively for educational and service improvement purposes.
list: Provide and improve our educational chemistry services
Personalize your learning experience and remember preferences
Analyze site usage for improvements and optimization
Ensure security and proper functioning of our services
Comply with legal obligations and respond to legitimate requests
Develop new features and educational content

cookies.intro: We use cookies to improve your browsing experience and analyze our traffic.
analyticsList: Google Analytics: Traffic analysis and user behavior tracking
Microsoft Clarity: User experience analysis and session recordings
cookies.management: You can manage your cookie preferences through our consent banner or your browser settings. Disabling analytics cookies will not affect the core functionality of our educational tools.

banner.title: Cookie Management
banner.intro: Our consent banner allows you to:
list: Access detailed privacy policy and terms of use information

thirdParty.intro: We use the following trusted third-party services:
services: Google Analytics: Website traffic and user behavior analysis
Microsoft Clarity: User experience analysis and session recordings
thirdParty.legalBasis: Legal basis: Legitimate interest for service improvement and consent for analytics
thirdParty.control: You can control data sharing with third parties through our cookie consent banner
thirdParty.policies: Each third-party service has its own privacy policy that governs their data processing practices

externalLinks.intro: Our website may contain links to external sites not operated by us.
externalLinks.details: We are not responsible for the privacy practices of external websites. We encourage you to review their privacy policies.

externalServices.intro: We use trusted third-party services to enhance our educational platform.
externalServices.details: These services follow their own privacy policies and adequate protection measures. Data may be processed outside your country.

retention.intro: We retain your personal data only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy:
items: Technical data: Up to 2 years for security and analytics purposes
Educational data: Until you delete your account or request deletion
Cookie data: As specified in our cookie policy (up to 26 months for analytics)
retention.note: Note: Some data may be retained longer if required by law or for legitimate business purposes such as security incident investigation.

rights.lgpdGdpr: Under applicable privacy laws (GDPR, CCPA, LGPD, etc.), you have the following rights:
rights.contact: Contact us at molclassapp@gmail.com with your request
rights.response: We will respond to your requests within the timeframe required by applicable law (typically 30 days for GDPR, 45 days for CCPA).
list: Access: Know what personal data we hold about you
Rectification: Request correction of inaccurate data
Erasure: Request deletion of your personal data
Portability: Receive your data in a structured format
Object: Oppose certain types of data processing
Restrict: Limit how we process your data
Withdraw Consent: Revoke consent at any time
Non-Discrimination: Not be discriminated against for exercising privacy rights

security.intro: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data:
items: Encryption of data in transit and at rest
Staff training on data protection practices

contact.intro: To exercise your privacy rights, ask questions about this policy, or report concerns, contact us:
contact.subject: Privacy and Data Protection
contact.response: We will respond to your requests within the timeframe required by applicable law (typically 30 days for GDPR, 45 days for CCPA).
contact.dataProtectionOfficer: For EU residents, you may also contact your local data protection authority if you have concerns about our data handling practices.

changes.intro: We may update this Policy to reflect legal, technological, or service changes.
items: The last update date will always be indicated at the top
Important changes will be communicated through the website or email (when available)
Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance of the changes
We recommend reviewing this policy periodically

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: Welcome to Mol Class. These Terms of Use govern your access to and use of our educational platform.

content.agreement: By accessing and using Mol Class, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms of Use. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you should not use our service.
content.scope: These terms apply to all visitors, users, and other people who access or use the service.

content.description: Mol Class is a digital educational platform that offers advanced technological tools for chemistry teaching and learning, including interactive, computational, artificial intelligence, and other educational technology resources.
content.featuresTitle: Available Features (including but not limited to):
features: Chemical and physical calculators, simulators, and computational tools
Molecular visualizers and interactive modeling systems
Interactive periodic table and chemical databases
Catalog of compounds, substances, and reference materials
Games, activities, and gamified learning resources
Artificial intelligence tools and educational support systems
Chemical data analysis, processing, and interpretation tools
Communication and interaction features for learning
Other educational tools and resources related to chemistry
content.evolutionText: The platform's features, functionalities, and technologies may be updated, expanded, modified, or discontinued at any time, always aiming to improve the quality and effectiveness of the educational experience offered to users.

content.agreement: You agree to use Mol Class only for educational and legal purposes.
permitted: Use tools for educational studies and research
Use calculation results for academic purposes
prohibited: Use the service for illegal or harmful activities
Attempt to hack, overload, or damage the system
Reproduce, duplicate, or copy the service without authorization
Use bots or automated scripts without permission

rights: The platform as a whole (collective work)
Compilation, selection, and organization of content
Mol Class brand, name, and visual identity
sources: Data from scientific and educational literature
Content created with the aid of artificial intelligence tools
Adaptations and inspirations from various educational sources
commitment: We use only permitted or public domain content
When possible, we credit the sources used
We do not claim ownership over fundamental scientific information
content.userContentText: Calculation results, projects, and work created by users using our platform remain their property.
content.fairUseText: We recognize that educational use may involve citations, adaptations, and references to existing materials, always respecting fair use and educational principles.

content.disclaimer: While we strive to provide accurate and up-to-date information, we do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or timeliness of any information in the service.
important: Always verify critical calculations with additional sources
Consult scientific literature for professional applications
We are not responsible for decisions based on our calculations

content.disclaimer: Mol Class is offered "as is" and "as available", without express or implied warranties of continuous operation, content accuracy, or fitness for specific purposes.
content.exclusionsText: To the maximum extent permitted by law, we are not responsible for:
exclusions: Interruptions, technical failures, temporary or permanent platform unavailability
Direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential losses arising from tool use
Academic, professional, or personal decisions made based on presented content
Accuracy, completeness, or timeliness of provided information
Use of results in critical or commercial applications without independent validation
Violation of third-party intellectual property rights
userResponsibilities: Complying with their institution's academic standards
Not using the platform for illicit purposes
content.paidServicesText: Any future paid services will have their own specific terms, prevailing over these general terms in case of conflict in paid functionalities.
content.exceptionsText: This limitation does not exclude responsibilities in cases of fraud, bad faith, gross negligence, or when prohibited by mandatory law, including Consumer Protection Code.

inappropriate.title: Inappropriate Content
inappropriate.text: We reserve the right to remove, without prior notice, any content that violates these Terms or is considered inappropriate.

reporting.title: Reporting Procedure
reporting.text: To report inappropriate content or violations:
steps: Include content link/location and reason for report
Response time: up to 5 business days

suspension.title: Account Suspension
suspension.text: Users who repeatedly violate these Terms may have their accounts suspended temporarily or permanently.

content.right: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time.
process: The last update date will always be indicated
Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance
We recommend reviewing these terms periodically

disputes: We try to resolve issues amicably
Legal matters are resolved according to applicable jurisdiction
We respect consumer protection and privacy legislation
Competent forum: user's jurisdiction (according to consumer protection laws)

entirety.title: Entirety
entirety.text: These Terms, together with the Privacy Policy, constitute the entire agreement between the parties.

independence.title: Clause Independence
independence.text: The invalidity of any clause will not affect the validity of other provisions.

assignment.title: Assignment
assignment.text: These Terms cannot be assigned by the user without express consent. Mol Class may assign its rights with prior notification.

validity.title: Validity
validity.text: These Terms remain valid while you use our services.

content.educational: This platform is designed exclusively for educational purposes in chemistry and related sciences.
content.responsibility: Users are responsible for using the tools appropriately and verifying results when necessary.

content.usage: We may use cookies and similar technologies to improve user experience and analyze platform usage.
content.control: You can control cookie preferences through your browser settings.

content.integration: Our platform may integrate with third-party educational tools and services.
content.responsibility: We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of third-party services.

content.disclaimer: Our platform may contain links to external websites for educational reference.
content.liability: We are not responsible for the content or practices of external websites.

content.availability: We strive to maintain service availability but cannot guarantee uninterrupted access.
content.accuracy: While we aim for accuracy, users should verify critical information independently.

content.law: These terms are governed by applicable consumer protection and privacy laws.
content.disputes: Disputes will be resolved according to the user's jurisdiction as provided by consumer protection legislation.

content.evolution: Our platform continuously evolves to better serve educational needs.
content.notification: Significant changes to core functionality will be communicated to users when possible.

content.lastUpdate: Last Update: {date}. By continuing to use Mol Class after this date, you agree to these updated terms.

footer.agreement: By continuing to browse, you agree to our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.

visualization.title: Molecule Viewer
visualization.subtitle: Explore molecules interactively
visualization.description: Enter chemical formulas, visualize 2D and 3D structures and explore different molecular representations.
visualization.placeholder: Search by name, formula, SMILES or CID...

controls.tooltip: Click and drag to move; Scroll to zoom; Shift + scroll to pan; Double click to reset

home.title: Mol Class
home.subtitle: Choose a tool in the sidebar to get started.
home.description: This is the starting point of Mol Class, where you can access various interactive chemistry tools.

calculators.title: Calculators
calculators.subtitle: Open one or more calculators from the menu.
calculators.description: Access chemistry calculators for molar mass, scientific calculations, and more.

molarMass.title: Molar Mass
molarMass.subtitle: Enter a chemical formula or element symbol
molarMass.description: Quickly calculate the molar mass of chemical compounds.

errors.generic: An error occurred while calculating molar mass

errors.divisionByZero: Division by zero is not allowed

periodicTable.title: Periodic Table
periodicTable.subtitle: Type a name or symbol to see details
periodicTable.description: Explore all chemical elements with complete data and interactive filters.

tableHeaderDescriptions.id: Unique identifier number of the compound
tableHeaderDescriptions.name: Name of the chemical compound
tableHeaderDescriptions.commonName: Common or alternative name of the compound
tableHeaderDescriptions.molarMass: Molar mass in grams per mole (g/mol)
tableHeaderDescriptions.density: Density in grams per cubic centimeter (g/cm³)
tableHeaderDescriptions.solubilityNumeric: Maximum amount dissolved in 100g of water (g/100g H₂O)

catalog.title: Inorganic Compounds
catalog.subtitle: Explore detailed information about inorganic compounds
catalog.description: Discover properties, composition, and uses of inorganic elements.
